text: haey( chaur changcha) nowpel del yeung ban bangheanh kanleng sangosang phteah( kak hpeah) dl ai pr hi m( yeung ban mean bantoul tha)chaur anak kom br pru td ampeu shi ri k mk champoh yeung aoy saoh haey anak trauv saamat phteah robsa yeung touk samreab banda anak del tvea hv ning banda anak del chhr( thvayobangkoum) haeyning banda anak del rou ko saou chout
